head.title: Saturday Night At the Nascar Races

hedline.hl1: Saturday Night At the Nascar Races

abstract.p: Photo essay of Saturday night NASCAR races at Waterford Speedbowl in Waterford, Conn (M)

block.p: EACH Saturday night more than one hundred drivers and their cars race around the one-third-mile oval at the Waterford Speedbowl in Waterford. This is the first year that the track, in its 50th year, has been one of 92 tracks sanctioned nationwide by the National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing, otherwise known as Nascar. Two other tracks in the state, in Thompson and Stafford, are also sanctioned.

During a recent pit party, spectators came down to the track to talk with the drivers and crews. Jeff Karns of Gales Ferry signed autographs for young fans before getting behind the wheel for his race.

This is the first year that the track, in its 50th year, has been one of 92 tracks sanctioned nationwide by the National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing, otherwise known as Nascar. Two other tracks in the state, in Thompson and Stafford, are also sanctioned.

During a recent pit party, spectators came down to the track to talk with the drivers and crews. Jeff Karns of Gales Ferry signed autographs for young fans before getting behind the wheel for his race.

Karns, who when not racing, is co-owner of a garage in Groton. He began racing there seven years ago, at age 17. To help defray the costs of competition, which runs from April until the first week in September, he has enlisted 19 sponsors, including the New London Police Department, which brings troubled teenagers to the track to cheer for him.
